titles.title: To authorize any Indian Tribe to lease, sell, convey, warrant, or otherwise transfer real property to which that Indian Tribe holds fee title without the consent of the Federal Government, and for other purposes.

To authorize any Indian Tribe to lease, sell, convey, warrant, or otherwise transfer real property to which that Indian Tribe holds fee title without the consent of the Federal Government, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs .

bill.summary: This bill allows any federally recognized Indian tribe to lease, sell, convey, warrant, or transfer its real property held in fee without requiring prior congressional approval.
